scripts.comment: In this assignment, we will be implementing code to perform the preprocessing required to convert the imported climate change narrative data (BBCNEWS variable) to the format required by the online LDA tool, jsLDA. The input data is a list of lists and needs to be converted into a text file with 3 tab-separated columns: document ID (URL), category (News Station), and the text (Snippet). For more information about the format check out https://mimno.infosci.cornell.edu/jsLDA/. Once you have it working, feel free to download the preprocessed data and upload it to the jsLDA tool for exploration. You can also use the tool to explore climate change narrative data from other stations such as CNN and Fox News.

block.comment: Use this script to download the preprocessed data and upload it to jsLDA at https://mimno.infosci.cornell.edu/jsLDA/jslda.html.

scripts.comment: Convert the imported CSV from GDELT to a tab-separated text file where the columns are URL, News Station, and Snippet. The Snippet column should have the text converted to lowercase and quotes removed. Feel free to use your custom blocks from the previous assignments!
